item.title: Tree Part 2 - Given N, Find The Total Number of Unique BSTs
item.description: Question Definition (S & T) Given N, Find the total number of unique BSTs that can be made using values from 1 to N Examples: Input: n = 3 Output: 5 For n = 3, preorder traversal of 1 2 3 1 3 2 2 1 3 3 1 2 3 2 1 Input: 4 Output: 14 Problem Analysis(A) At first, I did not quite understand what the question means.
